---
title: Genailib_wl Docs
---

Welcome to the documentation for Genailib_wl! We are excited to have you here.

This library allows you to interact with OpenAI's chat API with ease.

The following is the documentation of the genailib_wl_file.py. Its holistic purpose is to connect to openai and
return a response depending on the prompt you have given it.

```bash
❯ python genailib_wl_folder/genailib_wl_file.py
Enter the prompt (default: Hello World!):
Enter the model (default: gpt-3.5-turbo): gpt-4-turbo
✨ Genailib_wl task: Generating response from OpenAI
Hello! How can I assist you today?

❯ python genailib_wl_folder/genailib_wl_file.py
Enter the prompt (default: Hello World!): Tell me a joke
Enter the model (default: gpt-3.5-turbo): gpt-3.5-turbo
✨ Genailib_wl task: Generating response from OpenAI
Why don't scientists trust atoms? Because they make up everything!

❯ python genailib_wl_folder/genailib_wl_file.py
Enter the prompt (default: Hello World!):
Enter the model (default: gpt-3.5-turbo):
✨ Genailib_wl task: Generating response from OpenAI
Hello! How can I assist you today?
```
